text: Neale Andrew Fraser, (3 October 1933 â€“ 2 December 2024) was an Australian tennis player. Fraser was the most recent man to have completed the triple crown. He won the US Open in 1959 to 1960 and the Wimbledon Championships in 1960. After his playing career ended, he was non-playing captain of Australia's Davis Cup team for 24 years. Fraser was born in Melbourne, Australia. Fraser died on 2 December 2024 at the age of 91. ==References== ==Other websites== * Historic images and video of Neale Fraser talking about his career on Culture Victoria Category:1933 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Australian tennis players Category:Sportspeople from Melbourne
title: Neale Fraser
